alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley; North Central Mountains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 13 at 2:19PM MDT until April 13 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT TODAY FOR ALL AREAS BELOW SIGNIFICANT SNOWPACK DUE TO STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 7 PM THURSDAY FOR THE NORTHEAST HIGHLANDS AND NORTHEAST PLAINS DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, AND AN UNSTABLE AIRMASS... .While temperatures are much cooler today, an extremely dry airmass with widespread and long duration single digit relative humidity values has combined with strong to very strong west to northwest winds. This has yielded critical fire weather conditions areawide below significant snowpack. Strong winds and low relative humidity values will persist on Thursday across northeast and east-central New Mexico. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * AREA AND TIMING...This includes the Middle Rio Grande Valley, Sandia, Manzano and Gallinas Mountains, Northwest Plateau and Highlands, West Central Highlands, North Central Mountains below significant snowpack, and the East Central Plains. Critical fire weather conditions will continue through mid evening today. * 20 FOOT WINDS...West 15 to 25 with gusts to 40 mph west of the Central Mountain Chain and west 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 50 mph elsewhere. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Minimum values ranging from 4 to 11 percent. * IMPACTS....Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley; North Central Mountains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains; West Central Highlands
